content.en: Motor Drive Algorithms: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to improve the control and performance of various motor drive systems. These algorithms, such as adaptive wavelet neural networks and robust controllers, are designed to overcome uncertainties and disturbances in the systems. By combining different control techniques and utilizing online learning abilities, these algorithms aim to achieve high precision tracking, decoupling control, and robust characteristics in motor drive systems.
content.da: Motor Drive Algoritmer: Forskere har udforsket brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre kontrollen og ydeevnen i forskellige motordrivsystemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom adaptive wavelet neurale netværk og robuste controllere, er designet til at overvinde usikkerheder og forstyrrelser i systemerne. Ved at kombinere forskellige kontrolteknikker og udnytte online læringsevner, sigter disse algoritmer mod at opnå højpræcision sporing, afkoblingskontrol og robuste egenskaber i motordrivsystemer.
